title: Flame Strike
content:
Flame Strike Level 5 Evocation Spell 10~60 Damage 5d6Fire+5d6Radiant Make a pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 18m DEX Save Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Evocation Spell

5d6Fire+5d6Radiant

Make a pillar of divine fire roar down from the heavens like the wrath of affronted angels.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Flame Strike is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Flame Strike is a Lvl 5 Spell from
